text: Ara allah tomadera barighare tomadera jan'ya abasasthala baniyechena, ara gabadi-pasura camara theke tomadera jan'ya ghara baniyechena ya tomadera yatrara dine tomara halaka bodha kara, ara tomadera abasthanera dine'o, ara tadera pasama o tadera lomasa camara o tadera cula theke rayeche grhasthali-bastu o kichukalera jan'ya upabhoga-samagri.
